articles.description: Tim Farriss becomes emotional when questioned about the band's future prospects in court — he's suing the owners of a vessel he hired in 2015 after his finger was severed while he was onboard.
articles.content:
The lead guitarist of INXS has fought back tears while admitting to a Sydney court the rock band will never tour again after his finger was severed in a boating accident.
